_header: A babe is born all of a may / In the salvation of us
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 1628; for a variant, see 5565.
_description: An Epiphany carol — five quatrains with Latin caudae

OxfBal354.First Lines:
Ther ys a chyld borne of a mayIn saluacion of all
                    vs…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…To hys blis to bryng them allIhesu saluator
                    seculiExplicit
OxfBal354.Note:
Missing stanza 3; four quatrains (abab) plus burden (cc): Conditor
                        alme siderum / eterna lux credencium.
OxfBal354.Facsimiles:
Early Manuscripts at Oxford University: Facsimile

         (http://image.ox.ac.uk/show?collection=balliol&manuscript=ms354).
